XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT QMSample.sSampleName, Format(sSampleDateTime,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn'), QMSample.iSampleDateTime, QMSample.sArea, QMSample.sUnit, QMSample.sCertifiedCheck, QMSample.sLotNumber, QMSample.sCntnrNo, QMSample.sCustomerName, QMSample.sNote, QMSample.sOtherSampleName, QMSample.sPackageName, QMSample.sProductName, QMSample.sProductSpecName, QMSample.sReceivedBy, Format(sReceivedDate,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn'), QMSample.sResampleCheck, QMSample.sSampledBy, QMSample.sSamplePointName, QMSample.sSamplePriority, QMSample.sSampleStatus, QMSample.sTargetCompletionDate, QMSample.sTestCompletedCheck, QMSample.sHasOffSpecTest, Count(QMResults.sSampleName) AS CountOfsSampleName FROM QMSample INNER JOIN QMResults ON QMSample.sSampleName = QMResults.sSampleName GROUP BY QMSample.sSampleName, QMSample.sSampleDateTime, QMSample.iSampleDateTime, QMSample.sArea, QMSample.sUnit, QMSample.sCertifiedCheck, QMSample.sLotNumber, QMSample.sCntnrNo, QMSample.sCustomerName, QMSample.sNote, QMSample.sOtherSampleName, QMSample.sPackageName, QMSample.sProductName, QMSample.sProductSpecName, QMSample.sReceivedBy, QMSample.sReceivedDate, QMSample.sResampleCheck, QMSample.sSampledBy, QMSample.sSamplePointName, QMSample.sSamplePriority, QMSample.sSampleStatus, QMSample.sTargetCompletionDate, QMSample.sTestCompletedCheck, QMSample.sHasOffSpecTest; "

XHQ:DataMember.usage: String Sample Point name from ip_smpl

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT QMSample.iSampleDateTime, QMResults.iSeq, QMSample.sArea, QMResults.sMax, QMResults.sMin, QMResults.sOffSpec, QMSample.sOtherSampleName, QMSample.sProductName, QMSample.sProductSpecName, QMResults.sProperty, QMResults.sResult, QMSample.sSampleName,QMSample.sSampleName, Format(sSampleDateTime,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn'), QMSample.sSamplePointName, QMSample.sSampleStatus, QMResults.sSQCStatus, QMResults.sTechInit, QMResults.sTestMethod, QMSample.sUnit, QMResults.sUnits, Format(sEntryDate,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn'), QMResults.sLabTagname FROM QMSample INNER JOIN QMResults ON QMSample.sSampleName = QMResults.sSampleName; "

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT QMSample.iSampleDateTime, QMFieldAnalyzers.sFATagname, TAG.Units, QMSample.sArea, QMResults.sLabTagname, QMResults.sOffSpec, QMSample.sProductName, QMSample.sProductSpecName, QMResults.sProperty, QMResults.sResult, QMSample.sSampleName, Format(sSampleDateTime,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn') AS Expr1, QMSample.sSamplePointName, QMSample.sUnit, QMResults.sUnits FROM TAG INNER JOIN (QMFieldAnalyzers INNER JOIN (QMResults INNER JOIN QMSample ON QMResults.sSampleName = QMSample.sSampleName) ON (QMFieldAnalyzers.sSamplePoint = QMSample.sSamplePointName) AND (QMFieldAnalyzers.sProperty = QMResults.sProperty)) ON TAG.Tagname = QMFieldAnalyzers.sFATagname; "

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT Count(QMResults.sSampleName) AS CountOfsSampleName, QMSample.iSampleDateTime, QMCertificates.sApprover, QMSample.sArea, QMSample.sCustomerName, QMCertificates.sDocumentNumber, QMCertificates.sFilename, Format(sIssueDate,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn'), QMSample.sHasOffSpecTest, QMSample.sProductName, QMSample.sProductSpecName, QMCertificates.sReleaseName, QMCertificates.sSample, Format(sSampleDateTime,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn'), QMSample.sSamplePointName, QMSample.sUnit FROM QMCertificates INNER JOIN (QMSample INNER JOIN QMResults ON QMSample.sSampleName=QMResults.sSampleName) ON QMCertificates.sSample=QMSample.sSampleName GROUP BY QMSample.iSampleDateTime, QMCertificates.sApprover, QMSample.sArea, QMSample.sCustomerName, QMCertificates.sDocumentNumber, QMCertificates.sFilename, QMCertificates.sIssueDate, QMSample.sHasOffSpecTest, QMSample.sProductName, QMSample.sProductSpecName, QMCertificates.sReleaseName, QMCertificates.sSample, QMSample.sSampleDateTime, QMSample.sSamplePointName, QMSample.sUnit;"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT QMSample.iSampleDateTime, QMSample.sArea, QMSample.sCustomerName, QMSample.sSampledBy, QMSample.sNote, QMSample.sHasOffSpecTest, QMSample.sProductName, QMSample.sProductSpecName, QMReleases.sRelaxNumber, Format(sReleaseDate,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn'), QMReleases.sReleasedBy, QMReleases.sReleaseStatus, QMSample.sResampleCheck, QMReleases.sSample, Format(sSampleDateTime,'dd-mmm-yyyy hh:nn'), QMSample.sSamplePointName, QMSample.sUnit FROM QMReleases INNER JOIN QMSample ON QMReleases.sSample = QMSample.sSampleName;"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT AssetGroup.sPlant, AssetGroup.sArea, Assets.sEquipment, Assets.sDescription, Assets.sEquipmentType, Assets.sStatus, AssetGroup.sPlant, AssetGroup.sArea, Assets.sEquipment, 'A', 6, 1000, Assets.sEquipment FROM AssetGroup INNER JOIN Assets ON AssetGroup.sEquipment = Assets.sEquipment; "

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT AssetParameters.sEquipment, AssetParameters.sParameter, AssetParameters.sDescription, AssetParameters.sTagname, AssetParameters.sUnits, AssetParameters.rValue, AssetParameters.rHigh, AssetParameters.rTarget, AssetParameters.rLow, AssetParameters.iSchematicX, AssetParameters.iSchematicY, AssetParameters.sSchematicLabel FROM AssetParameters; "

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT WorkOrders.sEquipment, WorkOrders.sWorkOrderID, WorkOrders.sShortDescription, WorkOrders.sPriority, WorkOrders.sExternalProcedureLink, Format(WorkOrders.sEstimatedStart,'dd-mmm-yyyy') AS Expr1, WorkOrders.sSkillRequired, WorkOrders.rEstimatedCost, WorkOrders.rActualCost, WorkOrders.sCategory, WorkOrders.sCompletionDate, Format([WorkOrders].[sEstimatedStart],'yyyymmddhhnn') AS Expr2, WorkOrders.sEquipment FROM WorkOrders; "

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Scale Max for Estimated Cost Chart

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT WorkOrders.sEquipment, WorkOrders.sCategory, Sum(WorkOrders.rEstimatedCost) AS SumOfrEstimatedCost, Sum(WorkOrders.rActualCost) AS SumOfrActualCost, Format(WorkOrders.sEstimatedStart,'mmmm yyyy') AS Expr1 FROM WorkOrders GROUP BY WorkOrders.sEquipment, WorkOrders.sCategory, Format(WorkOrders.sEstimatedStart,'mmmm yyyy');"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Scale Max for Estimated Cost Chart

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT WorkOrders.sEquipment, WorkOrders.sCategory, Sum(WorkOrders.rEstimatedCost) AS SumOfrEstimatedCost, Sum(WorkOrders.rActualCost) AS SumOfrActualCost, Format(WorkOrders.sEstimatedStart,'yyyy') AS Expr1 FROM WorkOrders GROUP BY WorkOrders.sEquipment, WorkOrders.sCategory, Format(WorkOrders.sEstimatedStart,'yyyy');"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Scale Max for Estimated Cost Chart

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT WorkOrderProcedures.iSeq, WorkOrderProcedures.sWorkOrderID, WorkOrderProcedures.sStepName, WorkOrderProcedures.sStepDetail, WorkOrderProcedures.sCompleted, WorkOrderProcedures.sExternalLink FROM WorkOrderProcedures;"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT AMParts.sEquipment, AMParts.sPartID, AMParts.sPartName, AMParts.sPartDescription, AMParts.sOrderTime, AMParts.iQuantityUsed, AMParts.iInventory, AMParts.iInventoryRequired FROM AMParts;"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"Select a.sEquipment, a.sCategory, a.sEstimatedStart, a.rActualCost, a.rEstimatedCost, b.ScaleMaxEstimated, b.ScaleMaxActual FROM {AMWorkOrderTotalsMonthly} a, (SELECT sEquipment, sCategory, sEstimatedStart, max(rEstimatedCost) ScaleMaxEstimated, max(rActualCost) ScaleMaxActual FROM {AMWorkOrderTotalsMonthly} group by sEquipment, sCategory, sEstimatedStart) b WHERE a.sEquipment = b.sEquipment AND a.sCategory = b.sCategory AND a.sEstimatedStart = b.sEstimatedStart"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Scale Max for Estimated Cost Chart

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.sEquipment, a.sCategory, a.sEstimatedStart, a.rActualCost, a.rEstimatedCost, b.ScaleMaxEstimated, b.ScaleMaxActual FROM {AMWorkOrderTotalsYearly} a, (SELECT sEquipment, sCategory, sEstimatedStart, max(rEstimatedCost) ScaleMaxEstimated, max(rActualCost) ScaleMaxActual FROM {AMWorkOrderTotalsYearly} group by sEquipment, sCategory, sEstimatedStart) b WHERE a.sEquipment = b.sEquipment AND a.sCategory = b.sCategory AND a.sEstimatedStart = b.sEstimatedStart"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Scale Max for Estimated Cost Chart

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT IMTankVolumes.sTankID, IMTankVolumes.sMaterial, IMTankVolumes.rVolume, AssetParameters.rValue, AssetParameters_1.rValue, AssetParameters.sUnits, IMMaterialGroup.sMaterialGroup, IMMaterialGroup_1.sMaterialGroup, IMMaterialColor.iColor FROM ((((IMTankVolumes INNER JOIN AssetParameters ON IMTankVolumes.sTankID = AssetParameters.sEquipment) INNER JOIN AssetParameters AS AssetParameters_1 ON IMTankVolumes.sTankID = AssetParameters_1.sEquipment) INNER JOIN IMMaterialGroup ON IMTankVolumes.sMaterial = IMMaterialGroup.sMaterial) INNER JOIN IMMaterialGroup AS IMMaterialGroup_1 ON IMMaterialGroup.sMaterialGroup = IMMaterialGroup_1.sMaterial) INNER JOIN IMMaterialColor ON IMTankVolumes.sMaterial = IMMaterialColor.sMaterial WHERE (((IMTankVolumes.sDate)=(select max( a.sDate) from IMTankVolumes a where a.sTankID = IMTankVolumes.sTankID)) AND ((AssetParameters.sParameter)='MAXVOL') AND ((AssetParameters_1.sParameter)='HEEL'));"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.sMaterialCategory, a.sMaterialGroup, a.sUnits, sum(a.rHeel), sum(a.rMax), sum(a.rMeasured), b.iColor FROM {IMMaterialVolumes} a, {IMMaterialColor} b WHERE a.sMaterialGroup = b.sMaterial GROUP BY a.sMaterialCategory, a.sMaterialGroup, a.sUnits, b.iColor"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.sMaterialCategory, a.sUnits, sum(a.rHeel), sum(a.rMax), sum(a.rMeasured), b.iColor FROM {IMMaterialGroupVolumes} a, {IMMaterialColor} b WHERE a.sMaterialCategory = b.sMaterial GROUP BY a.sMaterialCategory, a.sUnits, b.iColor"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.sMaterialCategory, a.sMaterialGroup, a.sMaterial, a.sUnits, sum(a.rHeel), sum(a.rMax), sum(a.rMeasured), b.iColor FROM {IMTankVolumes} a, {IMMaterialColor} b WHERE a.sMaterial = b.sMaterial GROUP BY a.sMaterialCategory, a.sMaterialGroup, a.sMaterial, a.sUnits, b.iColor"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT IMTankVolumes.sTankID, (#1/26/2005#-IMTankVolumes.sDate) AS Expr1, IMTankVolumes.sMaterial, IMTankVolumes.rVolume, AssetParameters.rValue, AssetParameters_1.rValue, AssetParameters.sUnits, IMMaterialGroup.sMaterialGroup, IMMaterialGroup_1.sMaterialGroup, IMMaterialColor.iColor FROM ((((IMTankVolumes INNER JOIN AssetParameters ON IMTankVolumes.sTankID = AssetParameters.sEquipment) INNER JOIN AssetParameters AS AssetParameters_1 ON IMTankVolumes.sTankID = AssetParameters_1.sEquipment) INNER JOIN IMMaterialGroup ON IMTankVolumes.sMaterial = IMMaterialGroup.sMaterial) INNER JOIN IMMaterialGroup AS IMMaterialGroup_1 ON IMMaterialGroup.sMaterialGroup = IMMaterialGroup_1.sMaterial) INNER JOIN IMMaterialColor ON IMTankVolumes.sMaterial = IMMaterialColor.sMaterial WHERE (((AssetParameters.sParameter)='MAXVOL') AND ((AssetParameters_1.sParameter)='HEEL')); "

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.sMaterialCategory, a.sMaterialGroup, a.sMaterial, a.sUnits, a.iDaysBeforeToday, sum(a.rHeel), sum(a.rMax), sum(a.rMeasured), b.iColor FROM {IMTankHistory} a, {IMMaterialColor} b WHERE a.sMaterial = b.sMaterial GROUP BY a.sMaterialCategory, a.sMaterialGroup, a.sMaterial, a.sUnits, a.iDaysBeforeToday, b.iColor"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.sMaterialCategory, a.sMaterialGroup, a.sUnits, a.iDaysBeforeToday, sum(a.rHeel), sum(a.rMax), sum(a.rMeasured), b.iColor FROM {IMMaterialHistory} a, {IMMaterialColor} b WHERE a.sMaterialGroup = b.sMaterial GROUP BY a.sMaterialCategory, a.sMaterialGroup, a.sUnits, a.iDaysBeforeToday, b.iColor"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Type of process variable measured (FI, FC, LI, LC, etc.)
Tag Selection Priority (for multiple servers of same tags)
Source of the tag (e.g., PHD, PI, databases)
Type of process variable measured (FI, FC, LI, LC, etc.)
Tag Selection Priority (for multiple servers of same tags)
Source of the tag (e.g., PHD, PI, databases)

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: COLUMN_NAMES
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string[]:Date;WeeksAgo;Weekly US No 2 Heating Oil Wholesale/Resale Price (Cents per;Product

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT WorkOrders.sWorkOrderID, WorkOrders.sCategory AS sABC, WorkOrders.sShortDescription, WorkOrders.sStatus AS sStatus, WorkOrders.sEquipment, Assets.sEquipmentType, AssetGroup.sLocation, AssetGroup.sArea, AssetGroup.sPlant, WorkOrders.sPriority, ' ' AS ASSIGN_TO, ' ', ' ' AS PROBLEMCODE, Format(sEstimatedStart,'dd-mmm-yyyy') AS Expr1, Format(WorkOrders.sEstimatedCompletionDate,'dd-mmm-yyyy') AS Expr7, Format(WorkOrders.sActualStartDate,'dd-mmm-yyyy') AS Expr6, Format(WorkOrders.sActualCompletionDate,'dd-mmm-yyyy') AS Expr8, ' ', Format(WorkOrders.sCreationDate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS') AS Expr2, 0 AS ESTLABHRS, Costs.rESTLABCOST, Costs.rESTMATCOST, Costs.rESTTOOLCOST, Costs.rESTSRVCCOST, Costs.rESTLABCOST+Costs.rESTMATCOST+Costs.rESTTOOLCOST+Costs.rESTSRVCCOST, 0 AS ACTLABHRS, Costs.rACTLABCOST, Costs.rACTMATCOST, Costs.rACTTOOLCOST, Costs.rACTSRVCCOST, Costs.rACTLABCOST+Costs.rACTMATCOST+Costs.rACTTOOLCOST+Costs.rACTSRVCCOST, ' ' AS GLACCOUNT, ' ' AS MAIN_ACCOUNT, ' ' AS FR_DESCRIPTION, IIf(sStatus='OPEN' And Now()>WorkOrders.sEstimatedCompletionDate,1,0) AS bOverdueFlag, IIf(sStatus='OPEN' And Now()>WorkOrders.sEstimatedCompletionDate,round(Now()-WorkOrders.sEstimatedCompletionDate),0) AS iOverdueDays, IIf(sSTATUS='CLOSED' Or NOW()<WorkOrders.sEstimatedCompletionDate,0,IIf(NOW()-sEstimatedCompletionDate<60,1,IIf(NOW()-sEstimatedCompletionDate<90,2,IIf(NOW()-sEstimatedCompletionDate<180,3,IIf(NOW()-sEstimatedCompletionDate<365,4,IIf(NOW()-sEstimatedCompletionDate>=365,5,5)))))) AS OVERDUEGROUP, IIf(sStatus='OPEN' And Not (isnull(sActualStartDate)),1,0) AS bAgingFlag, IIf(sStatus='OPEN' And Not (isnull(sActualStartDate)),round(Now()-sActualStartDate),0) AS iAgingDays, IIf(sSTATUS='CLOSED',0,IIf(Now()-sActualStartDate<60,1,IIf(Now()-sActualStartDate<90,2,IIf(Now()-sActualStartDate<180,3,IIf(Now()-sActualStartDate<365,4,IIf(Now()-sActualStartDate>=365,5,5)))))) AS iAGINGGROUP, ' ' AS FOLLOWUPFROMWONUM, ' ' as CostCenter, ' ' as NotifNum, ' ' as NotifDesc, ' ' As ChangeDT, ' 'as CompDate, WorkOrders.sActualStartDate -#6/1/08#, WorkOrders.sEstimatedStart - WorkOrders.sEstimatedCompletionDate FROM WorkOrders, AssetGroup, Assets, WorkOrderCosts AS Costs WHERE WorkOrders.sEquipment=AssetGroup.sEquipment AND WorkOrders.sWorkOrderID=Costs.sworkOrderID AND WorkOrders.sEquipment=Assets.sEquipment;"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Work Order Type, ABC indc, Category

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.iLogID, a.dDateTime, a.sLogPriority, a.sLogType, a.sShortText, a.sXHQPath FROM {ELogentries} a"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT L.OPER_LOG_ID , L.I_DATE_TIME , L.DT_DATE_TIME , L.XHQ_PATH , L.XHQ_USER , L.LOG_TYPE , L.LOG_CLASS , L.SHORT_TEXT , L.LOG_PRIORITY , L.ASSOC_STRING FROM XHQ.XHQ_ELOG_METADATA_V L"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: REFRESH_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT UPDATESEQ FROM XHQ.XHQ_ELOG_UPDATE where APPLICATION='Elog'"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT A.OPER_LOG_ID, A.SEQ, A.ASSOC_TYPE_ID, A.ASSOC_STRING, T.ASSOC_TYPE FROM XHQ.XHQ_ELOG_OPER_LOG_ASSOC A, XHQ.XHQ_ELOG_OPER_LOG_ASSOC_TYPE T where A.ASSOC_TYPE_ID=T.ASSOC_TYPE_ID"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: REFRESH_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT UPDATESEQ FROM XHQ.XHQ_ELOG_UPDATE where APPLICATION='Elog'"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT OPER_LOG_ID, LOG_TEXT_ID, to_char(DATE_TIME,'yyMMddHH24MI') as I_DATE_TIME, DATE_TIME as DT_DATE_TIME, LOG_TEXT, XHQ_USER, CUST_USER, LOG_SEQ FROM XHQ.XHQ_ELOG_OPER_LOG_MSG"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select a.ANS_EXC_ID, a.LOG_ID, b.DEFINITION_ID ,c.PI_ID from (select ASSOC_STRING as ANS_EXC_ID, OPER_LOG_ID as LOG_ID from XHQ_ELOG_OPER_LOG_ASSOC where ASSOC_TYPE_ID='4') a, XHQ_ANS_EXCURSION_LOG_V b , XHQ_APP_LIMIT_V c where a.ANS_EXC_ID = b.EXCURSION_ID and c.Limit_ID = b.DEFINITION_ID"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: TABLENAME
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"Point Configuration"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Type of process variable measured (FI, FC, LI, LC, etc.)
Tag Selection Priority (for multiple servers of same tags)
Source of the tag (e.g., PHD, PI, databases)

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.OPER_LOG_ID, a.VALID_HOURS, TO_CHAR(a.DATE_TIME,'dd-Mon-yyyy hh24:mi'), nvl(a.LOG_TEXT,' '), a.LOG_TYPE, a.EXCRSN_LOG_ID, a.XHQ_USER, a.XHQ_PATH, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.DATE_TIME,'yyMMddhh24mi')), a.LOG_CLASS, max(decode(b.SEQ,1,b.TAG_NAME)), max(decode(b.SEQ,2,b.TAG_NAME)), max(decode(b.SEQ,3,b.TAG_NAME)), max(decode(b.SEQ,4,b.TAG_NAME)), max(decode(b.SEQ,5,b.TAG_NAME)), nvl(max(decode(b.SEQ,1,b.TAG_NAME)) || max(decode(b.SEQ,2,b.TAG_NAME)) || max(decode(b.SEQ,3,b.TAG_NAME)) || max(decode(b.SEQ,4,b.TAG_NAME)) || max(decode(b.SEQ,5,b.TAG_NAME)), ' '), max(decode(c.SEQ,1,c.ASSET_NAME)), max(decode(c.SEQ,2,c.ASSET_NAME)), max(decode(c.SEQ,3,c.ASSET_NAME)), nvl(max(decode(c.SEQ,1,c.ASSET_NAME)) || max(decode(c.SEQ,2,c.ASSET_NAME)) || max(decode(c.SEQ,3,c.ASSET_NAME)), ' '), max(decode(d.SEQ,1,d.WORKORDER_NAME)), max(decode(d.SEQ,2,d.WORKORDER_NAME)), nvl(max(decode(d.SEQ,1,d.WORKORDER_NAME)) || max(decode(d.SEQ,2,d.WORKORDER_NAME)), ' '), decode(nvl(a.EXCRSN_LOG_ID,-1),-1,'N','Y'), a.LOG_PRIORITY FROM XHQAPPS.XHQRC_OPER_LOG a, XHQAPPS.XHQRC_OPER_TAGS b, XHQAPPS.XHQRC_OPER_ASSETS c, XHQAPPS.XHQRC_OPER_WORKORDERS d WHERE a.OPER_LOG_ID = b.OPER_LOG_ID(+) AND a.OPER_LOG_ID = c.OPER_LOG_ID(+) AND a.OPER_LOG_ID = d.OPER_LOG_ID(+) GROUP BY a.OPER_LOG_ID, a.VALID_HOURS, TO_CHAR(a.DATE_TIME,'dd-Mon-yyyy hh24:mi'), a.LOG_TEXT, a.LOG_TYPE, a.EXCRSN_LOG_ID, a.XHQ_USER, a.XHQ_PATH, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.DATE_TIME,'yyMMddhh24mi')), a.LOG_CLASS, a.LOG_PRIORITY"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select sTagname, sDescription, 'PI##PI##REAL', sUnits, 'PI' From {TagsPI}"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Type of process variable measured (FI, FC, LI, LC, etc.)
Tag Selection Priority (for multiple servers of same tags)
Source of the tag (e.g., PHD, PI, databases)

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT ACTLABCOST, ACTLABHRS, ACTMATCOST, ACTSERVCOST, ACTTOOLCOST, ESTATAPPRLABCOST, ESTATAPPRLABHRS, ESTATAPPRMATCOST, ESTATAPPRSERVCOST, ESTATAPPRTOOLCOST, ACTFINISH, ACTSTART, OWNER, DESCRIPTION, ASSETNUM, GLACCOUNT, SITEID, PLATFORM, Format(SCHEDFINISH,'dd-mmm-yyyy'), Format(SCHEDSTART,'dd-mmm-yyyy'), STATUS, WONUM, WORKTYPE, format(SCHEDSTART, 'MM-yyyy') FROM DEMO_WO"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Work Order Type, ABC indc, Category

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value:
string:"Select PILimit.CNDTN_DEF_ID ,PILimit.PI_ID ,PILimit.LIMIT_ID ,PILimit.ZONE_TYPE ,PILimit.LIMNAME ,PILimit.DESCRIPTION ,PILimit.SUBTYPE ,PILimit.TYPE ,PILimit.ENABLED_FLG ,PILimit.CLASS ,PILimit.ANCHOR ,PILimit.LIMTYPE ,PIDef.Metric ,DECODE(PILimit.HIGHISTAG,0,NVL(To_NUMBER(PILimit.HIGH_VALUE),0),0) as CONST_HIGH_VALUE ,DECODE(PILimit.HIGHISTAG,1,PILimit.HIGH_VALUE,'-') as TAG_HIGH_VALUE ,DECODE(PILimit.LOWISTAG,0,NVL(To_NUMBER(PILimit.LOW_VALUE),0),0) as CONST_LOW_VALUE ,DECODE(PILimit.LOWISTAG,1,PILimit.LOW_VALUE,'-') as TAG_LOW_VALUE ,PILimit.HI_LO_TYPE as iHI_LO_TYPE ,PILimit.LIMITTYPE as SHI_LO_TYPE ,NVL(ANSLimits.EXCURSION_ID,-1) as EXCURSION_ID ,NVL(ANSLimits.STARTDT,'-') as STARTDT ,NVL(ANSLimits.ENDDT,'-') as ENDDT ,NVL(ANSLimits.DURHOURS,0) as DURHOURS ,PIDef.PI_NAME , PIDef.PI_DESCRIPTION , PIDef.PI_STATE , PIDef.PI_PRIORITY as SEVERITY , PIDef.TARGET_EDIT_URL , '%'||To_Char(NVL(ANSLimits.EXCURSION_ID,-1))||'%' , '%'||to_char(PILimit.PI_ID)||'%' ,PILimit.START_DATE ,PILimit.END_DATE from ( SELECT cd.cndtn_def_id, lim.pi_id,lim.zone_type, lim.limit_id, lim.NAME as limname, lim.description, cmc.code_name as SubType, lst.NAME as Type, lim.enabled_flg, cm.code_name as class, lim.anchor, cmt.code_name as limType, lim.hi_lo_value as MonitoringValue, lim.high_value, lim.low_value, lim.HI_LO_TYPE, Decode(lim.HI_LO_TYPE,1,'Low',2,'High',3,'High/Low','Unknown') as LimitType, lim.HI_LO_LO_REF as LowIsTag, lim.HI_LO_HI_REF as HIghIsTag, lim.start_date, lim.end_date, o.account_id as OWNER_USER, c.account_id as CRT_USER, u.account_id as UPD_USER, lim.owner_timestamp, lim.crt_timestamp, lim.updt_timestamp FROM xhq_app_limit lim JOIN xhq_adm_code_master cm ON lim.limit_class = cm.code_key INNER JOIN xhq_ans_cndtn_def cd ON lim.limit_id = cd.cndtn_def_id JOIN xhq_adm_code_master cmt ON lim.TYPE = cmt.code_key JOIN xhq_ans_cndtn_def_list lst ON lim.definition_list = lst.cndtn_def_list_id LEFT OUTER JOIN xhq_adm_code_master cmc ON cd.cndtn_cat_code_key = cmc.code_key LEFT OUTER JOIN xhq_ans_def_list_section sec ON lim.definition_list = sec.cndtn_def_list_id AND lim.section = sec.list_section_id JOIN xhq_adm_user o ON lim.owner_xhquserid = o.xhquserid JOIN xhq_adm_user c ON lim.crt_xhquserid = c.xhquserid LEFT OUTER JOIN xhq_adm_user u ON lim.updt_xhquserid = u.xhquserid WHERE lim.deleted = 0 ) PILimit left join
(select EXC.EXCURSION_ID, MDef.cndtn_def_id, MDef.cndtn_def_desc, MDef.anchor_xhq_path, MDef.Category, MDef.TAGNAME ,NVL(EXC.StartDT,'-') as StartDT ,NVL(EXC.EndDT,'-') as EndDT , DECODE(EXC.EndDT,'-',NVL(EXC.DurMinute,0),0)/60 as DurHours from ( SELECT MDefA.cndtn_def_id, MDefA.cndtn_def_desc, MDefA.anchor_xhq_path, MDefA.Category, MDefA.TAGNAME from ( select DEF.cndtn_def_id , DEF.cndtn_def_desc , DEF.anchor_xhq_path , (select MA.code_name from XHQ_ADM_CODE_MASTER MA where MA.code_key=DEF.cndtn_cat_code_key) as Category , PARAM.param_value_string as TAGNAME from XHQ_ANS_CNDTN_DEF DEF, XHQ_ANS_CNDTN_DEF_PARAM PARAM WHERE PARAM.cndtn_def_id=DEF.cndtn_def_id AND PARAM.parameter_code_key=1111 ) MDefA ) MDef left join ( Select EXCURSION_ID, definition_id, to_char(EXCA.start_ts,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss') as StartDT , nvl(to_char( EXCA.end_ts,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:ss'),'-') as EndDT , Round(To_number(nvl(CAST(EXCA.end_ts AS DATE),Sysdate)- CAST(EXCA.start_ts as DATE))*24*60,2 ) as DurMinute from xhq_ans_excursion_log_v EXCA where EXCA.start_ts=(Select Max(EXC1.start_ts) from xhq_ans_excursion_log_v EXC1 Where EXC1.definition_id=EXCA.definition_id) ) EXC ON EXC.definition_id=MDef.cndtn_def_id ) ANSLimits ON ANSLimits.cndtn_def_id=PILimit.CNDTN_DEF_ID LEFT JOIN XHQ.XHQ_APP_PI_V PIDef ON PIDef.PI_ID=PILimit.PI_ID"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: String PI_ID for filtering in Association
String Excursion_ID for filtering in Association
Blend Giveaway (Characteristic Delta x Blend Quantity)

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT SLIMITNAME,SSUBTYPE,SDESCRIPTION,STYPE,SACTUALVALUETAGNAME,DLIMITHIGH,DLIMITLOW,SLIMITHIGHTAGNAME,SLIMITLOWTAGNAME,SUBSTR(SANCHORPATH,0,INSTR(SANCHORPATH,'.KPI_Group')-1),'H_27',IEXCURSION_ID,IDEFINITION_ID,IPI_ID,ILIMIT_ID,IENABLE_FLAG,SCLASS,SLIMITTYPE,IHILOTYPE,SHILOTYPE,DTSTARTEXCURSION,DTENDEXCURSION,DEXCURSIONDURATION,SPI_NAME,SPI_DESCRIPTION,SPI_SEVERITY,SPI_URL,IPI_STATE, SEXCURSION_ID, SPI_ID FROM {XPM_Limits} where sType='Environmental' and sSubType='Emissions' AND iPI_ID is not NULL"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: String PI_ID for filtering in Association
String Excursion_ID for filtering in Association

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"Select sPI_DESCRIPTION|| ' - ' || SDESCRIPTION as DESCR, sPI_NAME||'.'||DECODE(IZONETYPE,1,'LC',2,'LW',3,'UW',4,'UC',DECODE(IHILOTYPE,1,'Low',2,'High',3,'Low','None') )||'.'||sCLASS as Alias, 'PMLimit##XHQRC_Oracle_15Minutes##Real##none##XHQ_Conn##' || To_Char(IPI_ID)||'##'|| To_Char(ILIMIT_ID )||'##'||DECODE(IHILOTYPE,1,1,2,2,3,1,0)||'##'||IHILOTYPE||'##'||IZONETYPE||'##'||to_CHAR(SCLASS )||'##'||TO_CHAR(SLImitHIghTagName)||'##'|| TO_CHAR(SLIMITLOWTAGNAME) as SCONFIG, N'Limit' as TagType, N'-' as Unit from {XPM_Limits} where dtACTIVATION<=SYSDATE and dtDEACTIVATION>SYSDATE UNION Select sPI_DESCRIPTION|| ' - ' || SDESCRIPTION as DESCR, sPI_NAME||'.'||DECODE(IZONETYPE,1,'LC',2,'LW',3,'UW',4,'UC',DECODE(IHILOTYPE,1,'Low',2,'High',3,'High','None') )||'.'||sCLASS as Alias, 'PMLimit##XHQRC_Oracle_15Minutes##Real##none##XHQ_Conn##' || IPI_ID||'##'|| ILIMIT_ID ||'##'|| DECODE(IHILOTYPE,1,1,2,2,3,2,0)||'##'||IHILOTYPE||'##'||IZONETYPE||'##'||to_CHAR(SCLASS )||'##'||TO_CHAR(SLImitHIghTagName)||'##'|| TO_CHAR(SLIMITLOWTAGNAME) as SCONFIG, N'Limit' as TagType, N'-' as Unit from {XPM_Limits} where IHILOTYPE=3 And dtACTIVATION<=SYSDATE and dtDEACTIVATION>SYSDATE"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Type of process variable measured (FI, FC, LI, LC, etc.)
Tag Selection Priority (for multiple servers of same tags)
Source of the tag (e.g., PHD, PI, databases)

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"Select SPI_NAME||'.'||Decode(ITARGETTYPE,8,'Target',6,'TargetLow',5,'TargetHigh',4,'TargetLow','Quali') as Alias, sPI_DESCRIPTION, 'PMTarget##XHQRC_Oracle_15Minutes##Real##none##XHQ_Conn##' || IPI_ID||'##' || Decode(ITARGETTYPE,8,0,6,0,5,0,4,1,-1)||'##' || To_CHAR(sTARGET_HIGH_TAGNAME)||'##' || To_CHAR(sTARGET_LOW_TAGNAME) ||'##' || To_CHAR(sTARGET_TAGNAME) as config, N'Target' as TagType, N'-' as Unit from {XPM_Targets} where DTSTARTDATE<=SYSDATE and DTENDDATE>SYSDATE UNION Select SPI_NAME||'.'||Decode(ITARGETTYPE,8,'Target',6,'TargetLow',5,'TargetHigh',4,'TargetHigh','Quali') as Alias, sPI_DESCRIPTION, 'PMTarget##XHQRC_Oracle_15Minutes##Real##none##XHQ_Conn##' || IPI_ID||'##' || Decode(ITARGETTYPE,8,0,6,0,5,0,4,2,-1)||'##' || To_CHAR(sTARGET_HIGH_TAGNAME)||'##' || To_CHAR(sTARGET_LOW_TAGNAME) ||'##' || To_CHAR(sTARGET_TAGNAME) as config, N'Target' as TagType, N'-' as Unit from {XPM_Targets} where ITARGETTYPE=4 AND DTSTARTDATE<=SYSDATE and DTENDDATE>SYSDATE"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.EXCURSION_ID, a.DEFINITION_ID, a.DEF_DESC, a.STATE_DESC, TO_CHAR(a.START_TS,'dd-Mon-yyyy hh24:mi'), TO_CHAR(a.END_TS,'dd-Mon-yyyy hh24:mi'), a.MIN, a.MAX, a.AVG, a.QTY_SAMPLED, a.DETECTOR_TYPE, a.XHQUSER, a.CATEGORY, a.ANCHOR_PATH, a.XHQ_VIEW, a.MONITORED_VALUE, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.START_TS,'yyMMddhh24mi')) FROM XHQ_ANS_EXCURSION_LOG_V a where DEF_DESC like '%Temp%'"

XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select count(1) FROM XHQ_ANS_CNDTN_DEF"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select IDEFINITIONID, SXANSNAME, STAGNAME, SLOWTAGNAME, STARGETTAGNAME, SHIGHTAGNAME, RTRIM(RTRIM(RTRIM(TMTagPrefix,'_LOW'),'_HIGH'),'_TARGET') as TMTagPrefix from ( select a.CNDTN_DEF_ID iDefinitionID, a.CNDTN_DEF_DESC sXANSName, Max(decode(b.PARAMETER_CODE_KEY,1111,b.PARAM_VALUE_STRING,1121,b.PARAM_VALUE_STRING,'')) sTagname, Max(decode(b.PARAMETER_CODE_KEY,1116,b.PARAM_VALUE_STRING,'')) sLowTagname, Max(decode(b.PARAMETER_CODE_KEY,1122,b.PARAM_VALUE_STRING,'')) sTargetTagname, Max(decode(b.PARAMETER_CODE_KEY,1117,b.PARAM_VALUE_STRING,'')) sHighTagname, NVL(Max(decode(b.PARAMETER_CODE_KEY,1116,b.PARAM_VALUE_STRING,'')),Max(decode(b.PARAMETER_CODE_KEY,1117,b.PARAM_VALUE_STRING,''))) as TMTagPrefix FROM XHQ_ANS_CNDTN_DEF a, XHQ_ANS_CNDTN_DEF_PARAM b WHERE a.CNDTN_DEF_ID = b.CNDTN_DEF_ID GROUP BY a.CNDTN_DEF_DESC, a.CNDTN_DEF_ID) "

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT TAG.Tagname, TAG.Description, TAG.Units, TAG.TagType, TagCalculation.sCalculation, TAG.Config FROM TAG LEFT JOIN TagCalculation ON TAG.Tagname = TagCalculation.sTagname"

XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select CONFIG_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_RUN_DATE,'dd-Mon-yyyy hh24:mi'), XHQ_ALIAS, RUN_INTERVAL, DATABASE_TYPE, CONN_STRING, SQL_TO_RUN, AGGREGATE_TYPE, VALUE_TIMESTAMP from XHQRC_XHQTORDS_CONFIG"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT XHQ_ALIAS, TO_CHAR(DATE_TIME,'dd-Mon-yyyy hh24:mi'), STRING_VALUE, NUMERIC_VALUE, QUALITY FROM XHQRC_XHQTORDS_RESULTS ORDER BY DATE_TIME"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT a.EXCURSION_ID, a.DEFINITION_ID, a.DEF_DESC, a.STATE_DESC, TO_CHAR(a.START_TS,'dd-Mon-yyyy hh24:mi'), TO_CHAR(a.END_TS,'dd-Mon-yyyy hh24:mi'), a.MIN, a.MAX, a.AVG, a.QTY_SAMPLED, a.DETECTOR_TYPE, a.XHQUSER, a.CATEGORY, a.ANCHOR_PATH, a.XHQ_VIEW, a.MONITORED_VALUE, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(a.START_TS,'yyMMddhh24mi')) FROM XHQ_ANS_EXCURSION_LOG_V a"

XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select DISTINCT WORKORDER_NAME from XHQAPPS.XHQRC_OPER_WORKORDERS"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT sEquipment, sEstimatedStart, sum(decode(sCategory,'Clean',rActualCost,0)) rCleanCost, sum(decode(sCategory,'Repair',rActualCost,0)) rRepairCost, sum(decode(sCategory,'Replace',rActualCost,0)) rReplaceCost FROM {AMWorkOrderTotalsYearly} GROUP BY sEquipment, sEstimatedStart"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT * FROM (SELECT sTagName, N'VTQ##SQLServerVizionOEAnalytics1day##' || sDataType || N'##not_used##'|| sQuery || N'##' || sColumns || N'##' || iInterpolation || N'##' sTagConfig, sUnits,sDataType sTagType,N'VizionOE Tag' sDescription,N'-' sCalculation FROM {VizionOE_VTQTags} UNION SELECT sTagName, N'VTQ##XHQCacheGroup##' || sDataType || N'##not_used##'|| sQuery || N'##' || sColumns || N'##1##', sUnits,sDataType,NVL(sDescription,N'-'),N'-' FROM {XV_DemoVTQTags} ) WHERE 1=1"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT DEFINITION_ID,DEF_DESC,ACTIVE,STATE_DESC ,SHARED,TS,OK,DETECTOR_TYPE,XHQUSER ,CASE WHEN DEF_LIST LIKE '%-%' THEN SUBSTRING(DEF_LIST,1,CHARINDEX('-',DEF_LIST)-1) ELSE DEF_LIST END sType -- ,CASE WHEN DEF_LIST LIKE '%-%' THEN SUBSTR(DEF_LIST,1,INSTR(DEF_LIST,'-')-1) ELSE DEF_LIST END sType ,CASE WHEN DEF_LIST LIKE '%-%' THEN RIGHT(DEF_LIST,LEN(DEF_LIST)-CHARINDEX('-',DEF_LIST)) ELSE NULL END sSubType -- ,CASE WHEN DEF_LIST LIKE '%-%' THEN SUBSTR(DEF_LIST,INSTR(DEF_LIST,'-')+1) ELSE NULL END sSubType --,SECTION_NAME ,CATEGORY ,ANCHOR_PATH,XHQ_VIEW,ALERT_INFO ,CASE WHEN HI_REF_FLG=1 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(HIGH_LIMIT AS float) END dHighLimit --,DECODE(HI_REF_FLG,1,NULL,to_binary_float(HIGH_LIMIT)) dHighLimit ,HIGH_LIMIT sHighLimitTag ,CASE WHEN LO_REF_FLG=1 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(LOW_LIMIT AS float) END dLowLimit --,DECODE(LO_REF_FLG,1,NULL,to_binary_float(LOW_LIMIT)) dLowLimit ,LOW_LIMIT sLowLimitTag ,ENABLED,LOGGED,MONITORED_VALUE,MASKED FROM XHQ_ANS_CONDITION_STATUS_V"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select v.EXCURSION_ID,v.DEFINITION_ID,v.DEF_DESC,v.STATE_DESC,v.START_TS,v.END_TS,v.MIN,v.MAX,v.AVG,v.QTY_SAMPLED,v.DETECTOR_TYPE,v.XHQ_USER,v.CATEGORY,v.ANCHOR_PATH,v.XHQ_VIEW, v.MONITORED_VALUE,v.MASKED,v.ALERT_INFO ,v.HIGH_LIMIT --,to_binary_float(H.PARAM_VALUE_STRING) dHighLimit ,CAST(H.PARAM_VALUE_STRING AS float) dHighLimit ,v.LOW_LIMIT --,to_binary_float(L.PARAM_VALUE_STRING) dLowLIMIT ,CAST(L.PARAM_VALUE_STRING AS float) dLowLimit from xhq_ans_excursion_log_v v left join (select * from xhq_ans_excursion_value_log_v where PARAM_NAME='LOW_LIMIT') L on v.Excursion_Id=l.Excursion_Id left join (select * from xhq_ans_excursion_value_log_v where PARAM_NAME='HIGH_LIMIT') H on v.Excursion_Id=H.Excursion_Id order by start_ts desc"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT [Id] ,[Name] ,[Description] ,[MethodDescription] ,[AccrualPeriod] ,[UnitOfMeasure] ,[IndicatorType] ,[DataType] ,[ValueType] ,[ValueStore] ,[ValueTagUri] ,[EnableTagWriteback] ,[ValueRangeMin] ,[ValueRangeMax] ,[Decimals] ,[IsPreviousPeriod] ,[AggregationMethod] ,[XHQAnchor] ,[RollupMethod] ,[Owner] ,[ReportMonth] ,[ReportDay] ,[ReportFrequency] ,[ReportHour] ,[ReportMinute] ,[AllowableDelayDays] ,[AllowableDelayHours] ,[AllowableDelayMinutes] FROM [dbo].[Indicators]"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: This is a Guid converted to string which XHQ supports

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT [Id] ,[Impact] ,[Type] ,[LimitStore] ,[LimitTagUri] ,[EnableLimitTagWriteback] ,[TimeDelaySecs] ,[ThresholdBand] ,[ResetBand] ,[LimitSetName] ,[IndicatorId] ,[IsEnabled] ,[EnableTagUri] ,[Owner] ,[UserDefinedCategory] ,[UserDefinedType] ,[UserDefinedSubType] ,[ReportMonth] ,[ReportDay] ,[ReportHour] ,[ReportMinute] ,[AllowableDelayDays] ,[AllowableDelayHours] ,[AllowableDelayMinutes] ,[ProbableCause] ,[Consequence] ,[CorrectiveAction] ,[ReportingFrequency] FROM [dbo].[IndicatorLimits]"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: This is a guid that XHQ must store as a string

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT [Id] ,[Type] ,[Owner] ,[TargetStore] ,[TargetTagUri] ,[EnableTargetTagWriteback] ,[TargetUpperThresholdStore] ,[TargetUpperThresholdTagUri] ,[EnableUpperThresholdTagWriteback] ,[TargetLowerThresholdStore] ,[TargetLowerThresholdTagUri] ,[EnableLowerThresholdTagWriteback] ,[TimeDelaySecs] ,[ThresholdBand] ,[ResetBand] ,[TargetBand] ,[Objective] ,[DeviationImpact] ,[EscalatedDeviationImpact] ,[IndicatorId] ,[IsEnabled] ,[EnableTagUri] ,[UserDefinedCategory] ,[UserDefinedType] ,[UserDefinedSubType] ,[ProbableCause] ,[Consequence] ,[CorrectiveAction] ,[ReportMonth] ,[ReportDay] ,[ReportHour] ,[ReportMinute] ,[AllowableDelayDays] ,[AllowableDelayHours] ,[AllowableDelayMinutes] ,[ReportingFrequency] FROM [dbo].[IndicatorTargets]"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: This is a guid that XHQ must store as a string

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT sIndicatorId,sLimitId,sTargetId,sTagName,sQuery,sDataType,sUnits,sColumns,iInterpolation FROM VTQTags"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Comma separated list of columns that constitute the V,T and Q

ITVOE_<IndicatorName>_<If Limit HI LO, if Target LOCAL or COMPANY or INDUSTRY><If Target TARGET or THRESHOLD or TARGETUPPERTHRESHOLD or TARGETLOWERTHRESHOLD or OUTERUPPERTHRESHOLD or OUTERLOWERTHRESHOLD, if Limit LIMIT>

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select sIndicatorName, sAggregationMethod, sIndicatorId, -- bIsProjected, sIndReportFrequency, sIndAccrualPeriod, sUsedPeriod, sUsedFrequency, dtSlotStart, dtSlotEnd, dtPeriodStart, dtPeriodEnd, iPeriodOrdinal, iSlotOrdinal, bIsPeriodEnd, dtTimeStamp, -- dProjectedValue, dIndicatorValue, dAccruedValue, IsMissingIndicatorValue, sIndicatorTag FROM [dbo].[GetAccrualValuesForIndicators]('YTD','MONTHLY',DATEPART(year,DATEADD(year,-2,GETDATE())),DATEPART(year,GETDATE()),null,null)"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"select sIndicatorName, sAggregationMethod, sIndicatorId, -- bIsProjected, sIndReportFrequency, sIndAccrualPeriod, sUsedPeriod, sUsedFrequency, dtSlotStart, dtSlotEnd, dtPeriodStart, dtPeriodEnd, iPeriodOrdinal, iSlotOrdinal, bIsPeriodEnd, dtTimeStamp, -- dProjectedValue, dIndicatorValue, dAccruedValue, IsMissingIndicatorValue, sIndicatorTag FROM [dbo].[GetAccrualValuesForIndicators]('MTD','SHIFT',DATEPART(year,DATEADD(year,-2,GETDATE())),DATEPART(year,GETDATE()),null,null)"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT t.dRangeMax,t.dRangeMin,t.iPollSeconds,t.iTimeSeriesDataPointId, t.sDataType,t.sDescription,t.sUnits, t.sTagName,'(v.dValue/100)*(t.dRangeMax-t.dRangeMin)+t.dRangeMin;CAST(SYSDATE+(1-v.iTimeId)*t.iPollSeconds/86400 AS TIMESTAMP)' sColumns, 'SELECT (v.dValue/100)*(t.dRangeMax-t.dRangeMin)+t.dRangeMin, CAST(SYSDATE+(1-v.iTimeId)*t.iPollSeconds/86400 AS TIMESTAMP) FROM ' || CASE WHEN t.iTimeSeriesDataPointId BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN '{XV_TimeSeriesData1}' WHEN t.iTimeSeriesDataPointId BETWEEN 6 AND 10 THEN '{XV_TimeSeriesData2}' ELSE '{XV_TimeSeriesData3}' END || ' v INNER JOIN {XV_DemoTags} t ON t.iTimeSeriesDataPointId=v.iPointId AND t.sTagName=''' || t.sTagName || ''' ORDER BY v.iTimeId ASC' QRY FROM {XV_DemoTags} t"

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT d.dGasTarget,d.dGasVolume,d.dHighWaterLimit,d.dLatitude,d.dLongitude,d.dOilTarget,d.dOilVolume,d.dWaterVolume, t.sCasingPressure10inTag,t.sCasingPressure13inTag,t.sCasingPressure7inTag,t.sChokeTag,t.sDownholePressureTag,t.sDownholeTempTag,t.sFlowlinePressureTag,t.sFlowlineTempTag, t.sGasVolumeTag,t.sOilVolumeTag,d.sStatus,t.sTubingPressureTag,t.sWaterVolumeTag,t.sWellheadPressureTag,t.sWellheadTempTag,d.sWellName FROM {XV_DemoWellTags} t INNER JOIN {XV_DemoWellData} d ON t.sWellName=d.sWellName"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Used to simulated targets as a collection of values

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT sWellName,D.dt, ROUND(dGasTarget*(0.95+0.1*DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE()),0), ROUND(dOilTarget*(0.95+0.1*DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE()),0), dHighWaterLimit FROM {XV_DemoWellData},(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE)-7*(ROWNUM-1) dt FROM ALL_OBJECTS WHERE ROWNUM<=52) D"

XHQ:DataMember.usage: Used to simulated targets as a collection of values
Used to simulated targets as a collection of values
Used to simulated targets as a collection of values

XHQ:ConnectProp.name: SQL_STATEMENT
SQL_STATEMENT
SQL_STATEMENT
XHQ:ConnectProp.value: string:"SELECT Template,Path,ParentPath,Name FROM {AFElements_SGI} UNION ALL SELECT Template,Path,ParentPath,Name FROM {AFElements_SGP} UNION ALL SELECT Template,Path,ParentPath,Name FROM { AFElements_ITVUpstream}"
